summary.para: Specifies the algorithm that is used when images are scaled or rotated.
summary.div: Note Starting in Windows 8, more interpolations modes are available. See for more info.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D2D1_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOR
member.summary: Use the exact color of the nearest bitmap pixel to the current rendering pixel.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D2D1_BITMAP_INTERPOLATION_MODE_LINEAR
member.summary: Interpolate a color from the four bitmap pixels that are the nearest to the rendering pixel.
